title: Bad Decisions
description: Reformed bad girl and unapologetic nerd Tabitha Wells is focused on just one thing... making it though her last year of law school. Any free time she has is filled by her job at Fernando’s Club, scheduling other people’s illicit encounters. Arranging that schedule is the closest she’s come to sex in ages - until she finds out that her friends Jason and Nate are now a couple, and one night, her dirty fantasies about them come true.Nathan and Jason want to take that one night, and build a future with it. They see exactly what’s missing from their lives in sexy, goofy, YA Fiction-loving Tabitha. Can they convince her that they’re worth her time? And worth the cost to her (already battered) reputation?Even if they win Tabitha over, can they steer around Jason’s past, and navigate Nate’s career ambitions?With three people’s futures at stake, is love a bad decision?
author: Jocelyn Adler
